oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Innovation in Seed Potato Systems in Eastern Africa
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: P.R. Gildemacher
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: diagnosis of the potato systems of Kenya, Uganda and Ethiopia identified integrated management of bacterial wilt (Ralstonia solanacearum) and late blight (Phytophthora infestans), soil fertility management, and improving seed potato quality as technology-based opportunities for innovation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: africa
innovation systems
